node.title: People — and pets — flee war in Ukraine
node.description: From dogs and cats to goats and bunnies, the pets of Ukraine are on the move along with people who love them.
node.content: ["Along with the estimated 3 million refugees who have fled Ukraine since the Russian invasion began on February 24, 2022, there are also untold numbers of displaced pets. Volunteers even set up a special shelter near the Poland-Ukraine border to help care for them.\u00a0", "In this photo, a girl from Ukraine keeps her pet cat warm as she arrives at the Vysne Nemecke border crossing in Vysne Nemecke, Slovakia.\u00a0"]
